about.intro: I'm Ricardo Camilo, a frontend developer passionate about creating memorable digital experiences. 🚀
about.description: As a developer with an investigative profile (93%), my approach combines technical precision with creativity. I believe that each line of code is an opportunity to create something extraordinary, transforming ideas into interfaces that delight and make people's lives easier. ✨
about.education: Graduated in Information Technology Management from FATEC, I found my true calling in frontend programming. With 4 years of experience, I specialize in React.js and Vue.js, always seeking best practices and innovative solutions. 💻
about.hobbies: When I'm not coding, you'll find me immersed in Chinese novels, manga, or accompanied by my five cats, seeking inspiration to bring even more creativity to my projects. 📚🐱
about.bruceQuote: "Be water, my friend. Empty your mind. Be formless, shapeless, like water. When you put water into a cup, it becomes the cup. When you put water into a bottle, it becomes the bottle. When you put water into a teapot, it becomes the teapot. Water can flow or it can crash. Be water, my friend." - Bruce Lee 🌊
